## Impact

<!-- How does this affect users? -->

- [ ] Critical - Prevents users from completing tasks
- [ ] High - Causes significant confusion
- [ ] Medium - Minor confusion or inconvenience
- [ ] Low - Cosmetic issue

<!-- Who is affected by this documentation issue? -->
